0.5.name: wordpress/macks-mlb-baseball-news-feed
0.5.description:
Mack's MLB Baseball News Feed plugin incorporates an external RSS news feed into a cool looking Flash news feed. The feed moves from bottom to top, with a nice MLB Baseball graphic, followed by headlines and stories. You can click on a story title or summary to see the actual page where it is posted. You can also edit the width and height of the plugin to suit your needs. Finally, you can select how many articles you want to appear in the feed: 1 to 10.

Relevant Keywords: mlb, baseball, major league baseball, world series, penant race, baseball scores, mlb scores, mlb results, baseball results, mlb news, baseball news, sports, sporting news, USA baseball

A variety of news is available, including:

  • Latest MLB League News

  • Individual Player News

  • Trades/Contract Updates

  • MLB Rumors

  • MLB Gossip, Chat

  • Spring Training Schedules

  • Game Results

  • Penant Chase
